A fine selection of European fashions
for the discerning career woman

About us

A ladieswear boutique carrying upscale, cruisewear, and casual pieces from European labels Gerry Weber, Bianca, Brax, and Vanilla, as well as some of own pajama creations. Our customers tell us they like us for our selection, as well as our service and fashion advice; and we really stand out for our expertise in selecting the pieces we carry.

Other locations

In addition to this, the Leslie St location, Elizabeth Schindler owns and operates two Gerry Weber brand-specific boutiques in the region:

Gerry Weber Toronto
1177 Yonge St, Suite 13, Toronto

Gerry Weber Burlington
442 Brant St, Burlington
